servinfo.title: Transfer Position Indicator Remains ON Steady at Ignition Switch ON

servinfosub.title: Wiring Diagram
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to “Wiring Diagram” under Transfer Position Indicator Does Not Come ON at Ignition Switch ON but Engine Stops:Motor-Shift Type (Transfer with Shift Actuator) .

servinfosub.title: Circuit Description
servinfosub.ptxt: Refer to Transfer Position Indicator Does Not Come ON at Ignition Switch ON but Engine Stops:Motor-Shift Type (Transfer with Shift Actuator) .

test1.ptxt: Check DTC referring to DTC Check:Motor-Shift Type (Transfer with Shift Actuator) .

action.ptxt: Perform DTC flow to repair and retry.

testgroup.title: CAN communication circuit check

test1.ptxt: Check CAN communication circuit between combination meter and 4WD control module referring to DTC U0073: Control Module Communication Bus Off:Motor-Shift Type (Transfer with Shift Actuator) .

testgroup.question: Is CAN communication circuit in good condition?

action.ptxt: Substitute a known-good combination meter and recheck. If transfer position indicator still remains off, substitute a known-good 4WD control module and recheck.
